item.title: Convolutions and More as Einsum: A Tensor Network Perspective with Advances for Second-Order Methods
item.description: This paper accelerates second-order optimization in CNNs by 4.5x, using a novel tensor network representation that simplifies convolutions and reduces memory overhead.
